anya-e0809n3:3: Puraṁ nagara mitthī vā, ṭhānīyaṁ puṭabhedanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:4: Thiyaṁ tu rājadhānī rājaṭhānī (ṭī.) ca, khandhāvāro bhave tha ca.
anya-e0809n3:6: Sākhānagara maññatra, yaṁ taṁ mūlapurā puraṁ;
anya-e0809n3:7: Bārāṇasī ca sāvatthi, vesālī mithilā, ḷavī.
anya-e0809n3:9: Kosambu, jjeniyo takka, silā campā ca sāgalaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:10: Susumāragiraṁ saṁsumāra (ṭīkā) rāja, gahaṁ kapilavatthu ca.
anya-e0809n3:15: Racchā ca visikhā vuttā, rathikā vīthi cāpyatha;
anya-e0809n3:16: Byūho racchā anibbiddhā, nibbiddhā tu pathaddhi ca.
anya-e0809n3:18: Catukkaṁ caccare magga, sandhi siṅghāṭakaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:19: Pākāro varaṇo cātha, udāpo uddāpa, uddāpa upakārikā.
anya-e0809n3:21: Kuṭṭaṁ tu bhitti nārī tha, gopuraṁ dvārakoṭṭhako;
anya-e0809n3:22: Esikā indakhīlo ca, aṭṭo tvaṭṭālako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:24: Toraṇaṁ tu bahidvāraṁ, parikhātu ca dīghikā;
anya-e0809n3:25: Mandiraṁ sadanā, gāraṁ, nikāyo nilayā, layo.
anya-e0809n3:30: Okaṁ sālā khayo vāso, thiyaṁ kuṭi vasatya’pi;
anya-e0809n3:31: Gehañcā, nitthi sadumaṁ, cetiyā, yatanāni tu.
anya-e0809n3:33: Pāsādo ceva yūpo tha, muṇḍacchado ca hammiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:40: Sabhāyañca sabhā cātha, maṇḍapaṁ vā janālayo;
anya-e0809n3:53: Gabbho ovarako vāsā, gāraṁ tu sayaniggahaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:55: Itthāgāraṁ tu orodho, suddhanto’ ntepurampi ca;
anya-e0809n3:62: Ālokasandhi vutto tha, laṅgī’tthī paligho bhave;
anya-e0809n3:65: Chadanaṁ paṭalaṁ chadda, majiraṁ caccaro, ṅgaṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:68: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭakaṁ dvāra, bāhā kūṭaṁ tu kaṇṇikā;
anya-e0809n3:69: Dvārañca paṭihāro tha, ummāro dehanī, tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:71: Eḷako indakhīlo tha, thambho thūṇo pumitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:72: Pāṭikā, ḍḍhendupāsāṇe, giñjakā tu ca iṭṭhakā.
anya-e0809n3:80: Saṅghāto pakkhapāso ca, mandiraṅgā tulā api;
anya-e0809n3:81: Thiyaṁ sammujjanī ceva, sammajjanī ca sodhanī.
anya-e0809n3:84: Atho kacavaro, klāpo, saṅkāro ca kasambupi.
anya-e0809n3:86: Gharādibhūmi taṁ vatthu, gāmo saṁvasatho tha so;
anya-e0809n3:87: Pākaṭo nigamo bhoga, maccādibhyo dhi tūdito ‘adhibhū’ti īrito kathito (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:94: Manusso mānuso macco, mānavo manujo naro;
anya-e0809n3:98: Budho vidvā vibhāvī ca, santo sappañña kovidā;
anya-e0809n3:99: Dhīmā sudhī kavi byatto, vicakkhaṇo visārado.
anya-e0809n3:101: Medhāvī matimā pañño, viññū ca vidūro vidū;
anya-e0809n3:102: Dhīro vipassī dosaññū, buddho ca dabba viddasu.
anya-e0809n3:104: Itthī sīmantinī nārī, thī vadhū vanitā, ṅganā;
anya-e0809n3:105: Pamadā sundarī kantā, ramaṇī dayitā, balā.
anya-e0809n3:107: Mātugāmo ca mahilā, lalanā bhīru kāminī;
anya-e0809n3:108: Kumārikā tu kaññā tha, yuvatī taruṇī bhave.
anya-e0809n3:112: Dhavatthinī tu saṅketaṁ, yāti yā sā, bhisārikā.
anya-e0809n3:115: Rūpūpajīvinī vesī, kulaṭā tu ca bandhakī.
anya-e0809n3:121: Vijātā tu pasūtā ca, jātāpaccā pasūtikā.
anya-e0809n3:123: Dūtī sañcārikā dāsī, tu ceṭī kuṭadhārikā;
anya-e0809n3:124: Vāruṇī, kkhaṇikā tulyā, khattiyānī tu khattiyā.
anya-e0809n3:126: Dāro jāyā kalattañca, gharaṇī bhariyā piyā,
anya-e0809n3:129: Sakhī tvā’lī vayassā tha, jārī cevā’ticārinī;
anya-e0809n3:130: Pume tū’tu rajo pupphaṁ, utunī tu rajassalā.
anya-e0809n3:135: Dhavotu sāmiko bhattā, kanto pati varo piyo;
anya-e0809n3:143: Jāyāpatī janipatī, jayampatī tu dampatī dampatīti padaṁ pulliṅga bahuvacanantaṁ ikārantaṁ, tudampati (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n3:144: Atha vassavaro vutto, paṇḍako ca napuṁsakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:146: Bandhavo bandhu sajano, sagotto ñāti ñātako;
anya-e0809n3:150: Amma, mbā jananī mātā, janetti janikā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:160: Nattā vutto paputto tha, sāmibhātā tu devaro;
anya-e0809n3:168: Sodariyo sagabbho ca, sodaro sahajo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:169: Mātāpitū te pitaro, puttā tu puttadhītaro.
anya-e0809n3:172: Bālattaṁ bālatā bālyaṁ, yobbaññaṁtu ca yobbanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:174: Sukkā tu palitaṁ kesā, dayo tha jaratā jarā;
anya-e0809n3:175: Puthuko pillako chāpo, kumāro bāla potakā.
anya-e0809n3:179: Taruṇo ca vayaṭṭho ca, daharo ca yuvā susu;
anya-e0809n3:182: Mahallako ca vuddho ca, thero jiṇṇo ca jiṇṇako;
anya-e0809n3:183: Aggajo pubbajo jeṭṭho, kaniyo kaniṭṭho nujo.
anya-e0809n3:187: Sīso’ttamaṅgāni siro, muddhā ca matthako bhave;
anya-e0809n3:188: Keso tu kuntalo vālo, ttamaṅgaruha muddhajā.
anya-e0809n3:197: Sīmanto tu mato nāri, kesamajjhamhi paddhati.
anya-e0809n3:199: Lomaṁ tanuruhaṁ romaṁ, pamhaṁ pakhuma makkhigaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:200: Massu vuttaṁ pumamukhe, bhū tvitthī bhamuko bhamu.
anya-e0809n3:203: Vadanaṁ tu mukhaṁ tuṇḍaṁ, vattaṁ lapana mānanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:205: Dvijo lapanajo danto, dasano radano rado;
anya-e0809n3:209: Gaṇḍo kapolo hanvitthī gaṇḍatthī (ṭī.) hanvatthī=hanu+itthī; hana+u (ṇvādi),
anya-e0809n3:212: Galo ca kaṇṭho gīvā ca, kandharā ca sirodharā;
anya-e0809n3:214: Aṅkitā tīhi lekhāhi, kambugīvā thavā matā.
anya-e0809n3:216: Aṁso nitthī bhujasiro, khandho tassandhi jattu taṁ;
anya-e0809n3:217: Bāhumūlaṁ tu kaccho, dho, tva’ssa passa manitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:219: Bāhu bhujādvīsu bāhā, hattho tu kara pāṇayo;
anya-e0809n3:223: Karasākhā, ṅgulī tā tu, pañca, ṅguṭṭho ca tajjanī;
anya-e0809n3:224: Majjhimā nāmikā cāpi, kaniṭṭhā’ti kamā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:229: Ratanaṁ kukku hattho tha, pume karapuṭo,ñjali;
anya-e0809n3:230: Karajo tu nakho nitthī, khaṭako muṭṭhi ca dvīsu.
anya-e0809n3:235: Uro ca hadayaṁ cātha, thano kuca payodharā;
anya-e0809n3:236: Cūcukaṁ tu thanaggasmiṁ, piṭṭhaṁ tu piṭṭhi nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:238: Majjho’nitthī vilaggo ca, majjhimaṁ kucchi catukkaṁ udare; 944-gāthāpi passitabbā tu dvisu;
anya-e0809n3:241: Jaghanaṁ tu nitambo ca, soṇī ca kaṭi nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:248: Asuci sambhavo sukkaṁ, pāyu tu purise gudaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:249: Vā pume gūtha karīsa, vaccāni ca malaṁ chakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:251: Uccāro mīḷha mukkāro, passāvo mutta muccate;
anya-e0809n3:254: Dvīsvadho nābhiyā vatthi, ucchaṅga’ṅkā tu’bho pume;
anya-e0809n3:255: Ūru satthi pume ūru, pabbaṁ tu jāṇu jaṇṇu ca.
anya-e0809n3:257: Gopphako pādagaṇṭhipi, pume tu paṇhi pāsaṇi;
anya-e0809n3:258: Pādaggaṁ papado pādo, tu pado caraṇañca vā.
anya-e0809n3:261: Paṇḍake aṭṭhi dhātvitthī, galantaṭṭhi tu akkhako.
anya-e0809n3:263: Kapparo tu kapālaṁ vā, kaṇḍarā tu mahāsirā;
anya-e0809n3:264: Pume nhāru citthī sirā, dhamanī tha rasaggasā.
anya-e0809n3:267: Tiliṅgikaṁ tu vallūra, muttattaṁ atha lohitaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:269: Rudhiraṁ soṇitaṁ rattaṁ, lālā kheḷo elā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:270: Purise māyu pittañca, semho nitthī silesumo.
anya-e0809n3:272: Vasā vilīnasneho tha, medo ceva vapā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:273: Ākappo veso nepacchaṁ, maṇḍanaṁ tu pasādhanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:284: Kaṅkaṇaṁ karabhūsā tha, kiṅkiṇī kiṁkaṇī kiṁ kaṇikā (ka.) khuddaghaṇṭikā;
anya-e0809n3:285: Aṅgulīyaka maṅgulyā, bharaṇaṁ, sākkharaṁ tu taṁ.
anya-e0809n3:295: Cela macchādanaṁ vatthaṁ, vāso vasana maṁsukaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:296: Ambarañca paṭo nitthī, dussaṁ colo ca sāṭako.
anya-e0809n3:298: Khomaṁ dukūlaṁ koseyyaṁ, pattuṇṇaṁ kambalo ca vā;
anya-e0809n3:299: Sāṇaṁ koṭamburaṁ bhaṅga, ntyādi vatthantaraṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:304: Uttarīya matho vattha, mahatanti mataṁ navaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:305: Nantakaṁ kappaṭo jiṇṇa, vasanaṁ tu paṭaccaraṁ.
anya-e0809n3:307: Kañcuko vāravāṇaṁ vā, tha vatthāvayave dasā;
anya-e0809n3:313: Arahaddhajo ca kāsāya, kāsāvāni ca cīvaraṁ;
anya-e0809n3:316: Phala,ttaca, kimi, romā, nyetā vatthassa yoniyo;
anya-e0809n3:317: Phālaṁ kappāsikaṁ tīsu, khomādī tu tacabbhavā.
anya-e0809n3:319: Koseyyaṁ kimijaṁ, roma, mayaṁ tu kambalaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:325: Visesako tu tilako, tyūbho nitthī ca cittakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:326: Candano nitthiyaṁ gandha, sāro malayajo pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:337: Yakkhadhūpo sajjulaso, takkolaṁ tu ca kolakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:338: Kosaphala matho jāti, kosaṁ jātiphalaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:341: Alattako yāvako ca, lākhā jatu napuṁsake.
anya-e0809n3:343: Sirivāso tu sarala, ddavo’ ñjanaṁ tu kajjalaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:347: Mālā mālyaṁ pupphadāme pupphaṁ dāmaṁ (ka.), bhāvitaṁ vāsitaṁ tisu.
anya-e0809n3:350: Seyyā ca sayanaṁ senaṁ, pallaṅko tu ca mañcako.
anya-e0809n3:357: Bibbohanaṁ co’ padhānaṁ, pīṭhikā pīṭha māsanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:358: Kocchaṁ tu bhaddapīṭhe thā, sandī pīṭhantare matā.
anya-e0809n3:364: Ghanapupphaṁ paṭalikā, setaṁ tu paṭikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:370: Kaṭṭissaṁ koseyyaṁ ratana, parisibbita mattharaṇaṁ kamā;
anya-e0809n3:373: Dīpo padīpo pajjoto, pume tvādāsa dappaṇā;
anya-e0809n3:374: Geṇḍuko kaṇḍuko tāla, vaṇṭaṁ tu bījanītthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:376: Caṅkoṭako karaṇḍo ca, samuggo sampuṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:379: Vivāho payamā pāṇi, ggaho pariṇayo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:382: Khujjo ca gaṇḍulo rassa, vāmanā tu lakuṇḍako;
anya-e0809n3:387: Kuṇī hatthādivaṅko ca, valiro tu ca kekaro.
anya-e0809n3:397: Ātaṅko āmayo byādhi, gado rogo rujāpi ca;
anya-e0809n3:403: Ñeyyaṁ tva’ru vaṇo nitthī, phoṭo tu piḷakā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:405: Pubbo pūyo tha rattāti, sāro pakkhandikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:409: Kaṇḍū kaṇḍūti kaṇḍūyā, khajju kaṇḍūvanaṁ pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:411: Pāmaṁ vitacchikā kacchu, sotho tu sayathū’dito;
anya-e0809n3:415: Visūcikā iti mahā, vireko tha bhagandalo bhagandaro (ka.).
anya-e0809n3:417: Meho jaro kāsa sāsā, kuṭṭhaṁ sūlāmayantarā;
anya-e0809n3:418: Vutto vejjo bhisakko ca, rogahārī tikicchako.
anya-e0809n3:421: Bhesajja magado ceva, bhesajaṁ mo’sadhaṁ pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:429: Kulaṁ vaṁso ca santānā, bhijanā gotta manvayo;
anya-e0809n3:430: Thiyaṁ santatya tho vaṇṇā, cattāro khattiyādayo.
anya-e0809n3:434: Rājā bhūpati bhūpālo, patthivo ca narādhipo.
anya-e0809n3:442: Pume licchavi vajjī ca, sakyo tu sākiyo tha ca;
anya-e0809n3:443: Bhaddakaccānā bhaddā kaccānā (ṭī.) rāhula, mātā bimbā yasodharā.
anya-e0809n3:452: Vaḷañje ca gahapati, mahāsālā dhane siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:455: Sajīvo sacivā, macco, senānī tu camūpati.
anya-e0809n3:461: Kañcukī sovidallo ca, anujīvī tu sevako.
anya-e0809n3:467: Amitto ripu verī ca, sapattā rāti satva’ri; (Sattu+ari)
anya-e0809n3:471: Viddesī ca diso diṭṭho,thā nurodho nuvattanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:473: Mitto nitthī vayasso ca, sahāyo suhajjo (ṭī.) suhado sakhā;
anya-e0809n3:477: Dūto tu sandesaharo, gaṇako tu muhuttiko.
anya-e0809n3:479: Lekhako lipikāro ca, vaṇṇo tu akkharo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:480: Bhedo daṇḍo sāma dānā, nyupāyā caturo ime.
anya-e0809n3:482: Upajāpotu bhedo ca, daṇḍo tu sāhasaṁ damo;
anya-e0809n3:484: Sāmya’ macco sakhā koso, duggañca vijitaṁ balaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:487: Pabhāvu’ssāha, mantānaṁ, vasā tisso hi sattiyo;
anya-e0809n3:491: Manto ca mantanaṁ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
anya-e0809n3:492: Tigocaro tu chakkaṇṇo, rahassaṁ guyha muccate.
anya-e0809n3:494: Tīsu vivitta vijana, channā, raho raho byayaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:499: Āṇā ca sāsanaṁ ñeyyaṁ, uddānaṁ tu ca bandhanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:501: Āgu vutta mantu (ka.) maparādho, karo tu bali muccate;
anya-e0809n3:502: Puṇṇapatto tuṭṭhidāyo, upadā tu ca pābhataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:505: Suṅkaṁ tvanitthī gumbādi, deyye thā’yo dhanāgamo.
anya-e0809n3:507: Ātapattaṁ tathā chattaṁ, raññaṁ tu hemamāsanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:508: Sīhāsanaṁ atho vāḷa, bījanītthī ca cāmaraṁ.
anya-e0809n3:510: Khaggo ca chatta muṇhīsaṁ, pādukā vālabījanī;
anya-e0809n3:516: Kuñjaro vāraṇo hatthī, mātaṅgo dvirado gajo;
anya-e0809n3:520: Kāḷāvaka gaṅgeyyā, paṇḍara tambā ca piṅgalo gandho;
anya-e0809n3:524: Kalabho ceva bhiṅkotha, pabhinno matta gajjitā;
anya-e0809n3:525: Hatthighaṭā tu gajatā, hatthīnī tu kareṇukā.
anya-e0809n3:536: Majjhamhi bandhanaṁ kacchā, kappano tu kuthādayo.
anya-e0809n3:538: Opavayho rājavayho, sajjito tu ca kappito;
anya-e0809n3:541: Tuttaṁ tu kaṇṇamūlamhi, matthakamhi tu aṅkuso;
anya-e0809n3:554: Ghoṭako tu khaḷuṅko tha, javano ca javādhiko;
anya-e0809n3:555: Mukhādhānaṁ khalīno vā, kasā tva ssābhitāḷinī.
anya-e0809n3:557: Kusā tu nāsarajjumhi, vaḷavā’ssā khuro saphaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:558: Puccha manitthī naṅguṭṭhaṁ, vālahattho ca vāladhi.
anya-e0809n3:560: Sandano ca ratho phussa, ratho tu naraṇāya so;
anya-e0809n3:564: Sivikā yāpyayānañcā, nitthī tu sakaṭo pya’naṁ (sakaṭo pi+anaṁ);
anya-e0809n3:565: Cakkaṁ rathaṅga mākhyātaṁ, tassanto nemi nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:567: Tammajjhe piṇḍikā nābhi, kubbaro tu yugandharo;
anya-e0809n3:570: Dhuro mukhe rathassaṅgā, tva kkho pakkharaādayo;
anya-e0809n3:573: Rathacārī tu sūto ca, pājitā ceva sārathī;
anya-e0809n3:577: Padāti pattī tu pume, padago padiko mato;
anya-e0809n3:578: Sannāho kaṅkaṭo vammaṁ, kavaco vā uracchado.
anya-e0809n3:580: Jālikā tha ca sannaddho, sajjo ca vammiko bhave;
anya-e0809n3:584: Javano turito vegī, jetabbaṁ jeyya muccate.
anya-e0809n3:586: Sūra vīrā tu vikkanto, sahāyo nucaro samā;
anya-e0809n3:587: Sannaddhappabhutī tīsu, pātheyyaṁ tu ca sambalaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:589: Vāhinī dhajinī senā, camū cakkaṁ balaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n3:603: Sampatti sampadā lakkhī, sirī vipatti āpadā;
anya-e0809n3:604: Athā vudhañca āyudhantipi pāṭho heti’tthī, satthaṁ paharaṇaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:612: Issāso dhanu kodaṇḍaṁ, cāpo nitthī sarāsanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:616: Vāṇo kaṇḍa musu dvīsu, khurappo urappo (ka.) tejanā’sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:617: Tūṇītthiyaṁ kalāpo ca, tūṇo tūṇīra vāṇadhi.
anya-e0809n3:619: Pakkho tu vājo diddho tu, visappito saro bhave;
anya-e0809n3:622: Maṇḍalaggo tu nettiṁso, asi khaggo ca sāyako;
anya-e0809n3:625: Kheṭakaṁ phalakaṁ cammaṁ, illī tu karapālikā;
anya-e0809n3:626: Churikā satya’siputtī, laguḷo tu ca muggaro.
anya-e0809n3:628: Sallo nitthi saṅku pume, vāsī tu tacchanītthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:631: Kaṇayo bhindivāḷo ca, cakkaṁ kunto gadā tathā;
anya-e0809n3:635: Niyyānaṁ gamanaṁ yātrā, paṭṭhānañca gamo gati;
anya-e0809n3:636: Cuṇṇo paṁsu rajo ceva, dhūlī’tthī reṇu ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n3:638: Māgadho madhuko vutto, vandī tu thutipāṭhako;
anya-e0809n3:642: Ketu dhajo paṭākā ca, kadalī ketanaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:645: Balaṁ thāmo sahaṁ satti, vikkamo tvatisūratā;
anya-e0809n3:646: Raṇe jitassa yaṁ pānaṁ, jayapānanti taṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:648: Saṅgāmo sampahāro cā, nitthiyaṁ samaraṁ raṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:651: Bhaṇḍanaṁ tu vivādo ca, viggaho kalaha medhagā;
anya-e0809n3:658: Nibbuddhaṁniyuddhaṁ (ka.) mallayuddhamhi, jayo tu vijayo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:662: Hiṁsanaṁ saraṇaṁ hiṁsā, vadho sasana ghātanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:665: Nidhano nitthiyaṁ nāso, kālo’nto cavanaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:675: Kārā tu bandhanāgāraṁ, kāraṇā tu ca yātanā.
anya-e0809n3:678: Brahmabandhu dvijo vippo, brahmā bhovādī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0809n3:682: Brahmacārī gahaṭṭho ca, vanappattho ca bhikkhuti;
anya-e0809n3:686: Upajjhāyo upajjhā thā, cariyo nissayadādiko nissayadāyako (ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:688: Upanīyā thavā pubbaṁ, veda majjhāpaye dvijo;
anya-e0809n3:689: Yo saṅgaṁ sarahassañcā, cariyo brāhmaṇesu so.
anya-e0809n3:692: Yāgo tu katu yañño tha, vedītthī bhū parikkhatā.
anya-e0809n3:694: Assamedho ca purisa, medho ceva niraggaḷo;
anya-e0809n3:695: Sammāpāso vājapeyya, miti yāgā mahā ime.
anya-e0809n3:699: Parisā sabhā samajjā ca, tathā samiti saṁsado.
anya-e0809n3:701: Catasso parisā bhikkhu, bhikkhunī ca upāsakā;
anya-e0809n3:702: Upāsikāyoti imā, thavā ṭṭha parisā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:708: Vedāna mādibhūtaṁ sā, sāvittī tipadaṁ siyā.
anya-e0809n3:710: Habyapāke caru mato, sujā tu homadabbiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:711: Paramannaṁ tu pāyāso, habyaṁ tu havi kathyate.
anya-e0809n3:713: Yūpo thūṇāyaṁ nimmantya, dārumhi tva’raṇī dvisu;
anya-e0809n3:719: Pañca mahāpariccāgo, vutto seṭṭha, dhanassa ca;
anya-e0809n3:720: Vasena putta dārānaṁ, rajjassa’ ṅgāna meva ca.
anya-e0809n3:722: Annaṁ pānaṁ gharaṁ vatthaṁ, yānaṁ mālā vilepanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:723: Gandho seyyā padīpeyyaṁ, dānavatthū siyuṁ dasa.
anya-e0809n3:726: Pitudānaṁ tu nivāpo, saddhaṁ tu taṁva sātthato.
anya-e0809n3:728: Pume atithi āgantu, pāhunā vesikā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:729: Aññattha gantu micchanto, gamiko thā ggha magghiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:740: Upāsanaṁ tu sussūsā, sā pāricariyā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:742: Mona mabhāsanaṁ tuṇhī, bhāvo tha paṭipāṭi sā;
anya-e0809n3:745: Tapo ca saṁyamo sīlaṁ, niyamo tu vatañca vā;
anya-e0809n3:751: Yo pāpehi upāvatto, vāso saddhiṁ guṇehi so;
anya-e0809n3:755: Vācaṁyamo tu muni ca, tāpaso tu isī rito.
anya-e0809n3:764: Aññā tu arahattañca, thūpo tu cetiyaṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:765: Dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko ca, ānando dve samā tha ca.
anya-e0809n3:769: Bhikkhupi sāmaṇero ca, sikkhamānā ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0809n3:772: Patto ticīvaraṁ kāya, bandhanaṁ vāsi sūci ca;
anya-e0809n3:775: Sāmaṇero ca samaṇu, ddeso cātha digambaro;
anya-e0809n3:776: Aceḷako nigaṇṭho ca, jaṭilo tu jaṭādharo.
anya-e0809n3:781: Pavitto payato pūto, cammaṁ tu ajinaṁ pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:791: Vesso ca vesiyāno tha, jīvanaṁ vutti jīvikā;
anya-e0809n3:797: Khettājīvo kassako tha, khettaṁ kedāra muccate;
anya-e0809n3:800: Dāttaṁ lavitta masitaṁ ‘‘asita’’ saddo puṁnapuṁsake-1005-gāthā passitabbā, patodo tutta pājanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:801: Yottaṁ tu rajju rasmitthī, phālo tu kasako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:804: Sammā tu yugakīlasmiṁ, sītā tu halapaddhati.
anya-e0809n3:807: Sāli vīhi ca kudrūso, godhumo varako yavo;
anya-e0809n3:808: Kaṅgūti satta dhaññāni, nīvārādī tu tabbhidā.
anya-e0809n3:813: Atha kaṅgu piyaṅgu’tthī, ummā tu atasī bhave;
anya-e0809n3:814: Kiṭṭhañca sassaṁ dhaññañca viññeyyaṁ (ṭī.), vīhi thambakarī thambhakarī (ka.) rito.
anya-e0809n3:816: Kaṇḍo tu nāḷa matha so, palālaṁ nitthi nipphalo;
anya-e0809n3:817: Bhusaṁ kaliṅgaro cātha, thuso dhaññattace tha ca.
anya-e0809n3:821: Khalo ca dhaññakaraṇaṁ, thambothambho (ka.) gumbo tiṇādinaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:823: Ayoggo musalo nitthī, kullo suppa manitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:824: Atho’ddhanañca culli’tthī, kilañjo tu kaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n3:827: Kolambo cātha maṇikaṁ, bhāṇako ca arañjaro.
anya-e0809n3:829: Ghaṭo dvīsu kuṭo nitthī, kumbho kalasa, vārakā;
anya-e0809n3:830: Kaṁso bhuñjanapatto thā, mattaṁ patto ca bhājanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:832: Aṇḍupakaṁ cumbaṭakaṁ, sarāvo tu ca mallako;
anya-e0809n3:836: Mahosadhaṁ tu taṁ sukkhaṁ, maricaṁ tu ca kolakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:839: Dhaññambilaṁ biḷaṅgo tha, lavaṇaṁ loṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n3:841: Sāmuddaṁ sindhavo nitthī, kāḷaloṇaṁ tu ubbhidaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:842: Biḷakaṁ biḷāla (ka.) ceti pañcete, pabhedā lavaṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n3:844: Guḷo ca phāṇitaṁ khaṇḍo, macchaṇḍī sakkharā iti;
anya-e0809n3:847: Lājā siyā’kkhataṁ cātha, dhānā bhaṭṭhayave bhave;
anya-e0809n3:848: Abaddhasattu mantho ca, pūpā’ pūpā tu piṭṭhako.
anya-e0809n3:851: Odaniko ca rasako, sūpo tu byañjanaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:853: Odano vā kuraṁ bhattaṁ, bhikkhā cā’nna mathā sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:857: Khajjaṁ tu bhojja leyyāni, peyyanti catudhā’sanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:862: Vighāsādo ca damako, pipāsā tu ca tassanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:865: Udreko ceva uggāro, sohiccaṁ titti tappanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:872: Uttamaṇṇo ca dhaniko, dhamaṇṇo tu iṇāyiko.
anya-e0809n3:874: Uddhāro tu iṇaṁ vuttaṁ, mūlaṁ tu pābhataṁ bhave;
anya-e0809n3:880: Saṅkhyāne tu ca saṅkhyeyye, ekatte vīsatādayo;
anya-e0809n3:883: Sataṁ sahassaṁ niyutaṁ nahutaṁ-nayutaṁ (katthaci), lakkhaṁ koṭi pakoṭiyo;
anya-e0809n3:887: Ahahaṁ ababaṁ cevā, ṭaṭaṁ sogandhi kuppalaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:898: Tulā, pattha, ṅguli, vasā, tidhā māna matho siyā.
anya-e0809n3:902: Dve akkhā māsakā pañca, kkhānaṁ dharaṇamaṭṭhakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:904: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṁ, nikkhaṁ tvanitthi pañca te;
anya-e0809n3:905: Pādo bhāge catutthe tha, dharaṇāni palaṁ dasa.
anya-e0809n3:907: Tulā palasataṁ cātha, bhāro vīsati tā tulā;
anya-e0809n3:918: Āḷhako nitthiyaṁ tumbho, patthotu nāḷi nāriyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:924: Dabbaṁ vittaṁ sāpateyyaṁ, vasva’ttho vibhavo bhave.
anya-e0809n3:926: Koso hiraññañca katā, kataṁ kañcana, rūpiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:927: Kuppaṁ tadaññaṁ tambādi, rūpiyaṁ dvaya māhataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:929: Suvaṇṇaṁ kanakaṁ jāta, rūpaṁ soṇṇañca kañcanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:930: Satthuvaṇṇo harī kambu, cāru hemañca hāṭakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:932: Tapaniyaṁ hiraññaṁ ta, bbhedā cāmīkarampi ca;
anya-e0809n3:933: Sātakumbhaṁ tathā jambu, nadaṁ siṅgī ca nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:935: Rūpiyaṁ rajataṁ sajjhu, rūpī sajjhaṁ atho vasu;
anya-e0809n3:938: Suvaṇṇaṁ rajataṁ muttā, maṇi veḷuriyāni ca;
anya-e0809n3:941: Lohitaṅko ca paduma, rāgo rattamaṇi pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:942: Vaṁsavaṇṇo veḷuriyaṁ, pavāḷaṁ vā ca viddumo.
anya-e0809n3:944: Masāragallaṁ kabaramaṇi, atha muttā ca muttikaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:945: Rīti rīrī (ṭī.) tthī ārakūṭo vā, amalaṁ tva’bbhakaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:949: Kāḷatipu tu sīsañca, haritālaṁ tu pītanaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:951: Cinapiṭṭhañca sindūraṁ, atha tūlo tathā picu;
anya-e0809n3:952: Khuddajaṁ tu madhu khuddaṁ, madhucchiṭṭhaṁ tu sitthakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:956: Usabho balībaddho balibadda (ka.) ca, goṇo govasabho vuso.
anya-e0809n3:958: Vuddho jaraggavo so tha, dammo vacchataro samā;
anya-e0809n3:959: Dhuravāhī tu dhorayho, govindo dhikato gavaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:961: Vaho ca khandhadeso tha, kakudho kakudo (ka.) kaku vuccate;
anya-e0809n3:962: Atho visāṇaṁ siṅgañca, rattagāvī tu rohiṇī.
anya-e0809n3:964: Gāvī ca siṅginī go ca, vañjhā tu kathyate vasā;
anya-e0809n3:968: Gomiḷho gomayo nitthī, atho sappi ghataṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:970: Navuddhaṭaṁ tu nonītaṁ, damimaṇḍaṁ tu matthu ca,
anya-e0809n3:971: Khīraṁ duddhaṁ payo thaññaṁ, takkaṁ tu mathitaṁ pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:973: Khīraṁ dadhi ghataṁ takkaṁ, nonītaṁ pañca gorasā;
anya-e0809n3:974: Urabbho meṇḍa mesā ca, uraṇo avi eḷako.
anya-e0809n3:978: Gadrabho tu kharo vutto, uraṇī tu ajī ajā.
anya-e0809n3:987: Tacchako tantavāyo ca, rajako ca nahāpito;
anya-e0809n3:991: Rathakāro tha suvaṇṇa, kāro nāḷindhamo bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1001: Veno vilīvakāro ca, naḷakāro samā tayo;
anya-e0809n3:1012: Māyā tu sambarī māyā, kāro tu indajāliko;
anya-e0809n3:1014: Orabbhikā sūkarikā, māgavikā te ca sākuṇikā;
anya-e0809n3:1015: Hantvā jīvante’ḷaka, sūkara, miga, pakkhino kamato.
anya-e0809n3:1019: Vetaniko tu bhatako, kammakaro tha kiṁ karo;
anya-e0809n3:1020: Dāso ca ceṭako pesso, bhacco ca paricāriko.
anya-e0809n3:1023: Dāsā karamarānīto, ccevaṁ te catudhā siyuṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1030: Sapāko ceva caṇḍālo, mātaṅgo sapaco bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1035: Sārameyyo ca sunakho, suno soṇo ca kukkuro.
anya-e0809n3:1041: Sābandhanaṁ tu gaddūlo, dīpako tu ca cetako;
anya-e0809n3:1042: Bandhanaṁ gaṇṭhi pāso tha, vāgurā vākarā (sī. ṭī.) migabandhanī.
anya-e0809n3:1044: Thiyaṁ kuveṇī kumīnaṁ, ānayo jāla muccate;
anya-e0809n3:1052: Suttaṁ tantu pume tantaṁ, potthaṁ lepyādikammani;
anya-e0809n3:1056: Mañjūsā peḷā piṭako, tvitthiyaṁ pacchi peṭako.
anya-e0809n3:1059: Upāhano vā pādu’tthī, tabbhedā pādukā pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:1066: Tabbhastā gaggarī nārī, sattaṁ tu pipphalaṁ bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1070: Kharo ca kakaco nitthī, sippaṁ kammaṁ kalādikaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1077: Opamma mupamānaṁ cu, pamā bhati tu nāriyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1079: Nibbeso vetanaṁ mūlyaṁ, jūtaṁ tvanitthi ketavaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1082: Pāṭibhogotu paṭibhū, akkho tu pāsako bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1083: Pumevā’ ṭṭhapadaṁaṭṭhāpadaṁ (ṭī. sī.) sāri, phalake tha paṇo, bbhuto.
anya-e0809n3:1085: Kiṇṇaṁ tu madirābīje, madhu madhvāsave mataṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1086: Madirā vāruṇī majjaṁ, surā bhavo tu merayaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1096: Araññaṁ kānanaṁ dāyo, gahanaṁ vipinaṁ vanaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1100: Tarusaṇḍo sa ārāmo, tatho pavana muccate.
anya-e0809n3:1105: Panti vīthyā’vali seṇī, pāḷi lekhā tu rāji ca;
anya-e0809n3:1106: Pādapo viṭapī rukkho, ago sālo mahīruho.
anya-e0809n3:1108: Dumo taru kujo sākhī, gaccho tu khuddapādapo;
anya-e0809n3:1109: Phalanti ye vinā pupphaṁ, te vuccanti vanappatī.
anya-e0809n3:1113: Tīsu vañcyā’phalā cātha, phalino phalavā phalī.
anya-e0809n3:1115: Samphullito tu vikaco, phullo vikasito tisu;
anya-e0809n3:1116: Siro’ggaṁ sikharo nitthī, sākhā tu kathitā latā.
anya-e0809n3:1118: Dalaṁ palāsaṁ chadanaṁ, paṇṇaṁ pattaṁ chado pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1119: Pallavo vā kisalayaṁ, navubbhinne tu aṅkuro.
anya-e0809n3:1121: Makulaṁ vā kuṭumalo, khārako tu ca jālakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1124: Pasavo kusumaṁ pupphaṁ, parāgo pupphajo rajo;
anya-e0809n3:1125: Makarando madhu mataṁ, thavako tu ca gocchako.
anya-e0809n3:1131: Mallikādī tu kusume, saliṅgā vīhayo phale;
anya-e0809n3:1134: Mūla mārabbha sākhanto, khandho bhāgo tarussa tha;
anya-e0809n3:1135: Koṭaro nitthiyaṁ rukkha, cchidde kaṭṭhaṁ tu dāru ca.
anya-e0809n3:1137: Bundo mūlañca pādo tha, saṅku’tto khāṇunitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1138: Karahāṭaṁ tu kando tha, kaḷīro matthako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1140: Vallarī mañjarī nārī, vallī tu kathitā latā;
anya-e0809n3:1141: Thambho gumbo ca akkhandhe, latā virū patāninī.
anya-e0809n3:1143: Assattho bodhi ca dvīsu, nigrodho tu vaṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1144: Kabiṭṭho ca kapittho ca, yaññaṅgo tu udumbaro.
anya-e0809n3:1149: Dantasaṭho ca jambhīro, varaṇo tu kareri ca;
anya-e0809n3:1150: Kiṁ suko pālibhaddotha, vañjulo tu ca vetaso.
anya-e0809n3:1153: Atho guḷaphalo pīlu, sobhañjano ca siggu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1159: Mālūra beluvābillo, punnāgo tu ca kesaro;
anya-e0809n3:1160: Sālavo tu ca loddo tha, piyālo sannakaddu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1167: Puṇḍarīko ca setambo, selu tu bahuvārako;
anya-e0809n3:1168: Sepaṇṇī kāsmirī cātha, kolī ca badarītthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1176: Kadambo piyako nīpo, bhallī bhallātako tisu;
anya-e0809n3:1177: Jhāvuko piculo cātha, tilako khurako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1179: Ciñcā ca tintiṇī cātha, gaddabhaṇḍo kapītano;
anya-e0809n3:1183: Niculo mucalindo ca, nīpo tha piyako tathā;
anya-e0809n3:1188: Yūpo pūgo (ka.) tu kamuko cātha, paṭṭi lākhāpasādano.
anya-e0809n3:1193: Pakiriyo pūtiko tha, rohī rohitako bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1194: Eraṇḍo tu ca āmaṇḍo, atha sattuphalā samī.
anya-e0809n3:1197: Somavakko tu kadaro, sallotu madano bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1199: Athāpi indasālo ca, sallakī khārako siyā;
anya-e0809n3:1200: Devadāru bhaddadāru, campeyyo tu ca campako.
anya-e0809n3:1206: Nimbo’riṭṭho pucimando, karako tu ca dāḷimo.
anya-e0809n3:1208: Saralo pūtikaṭṭhañca, kapilā tu ca siṁsapā;
anya-e0809n3:1209: Sāmā piyaṅgu kaṅgupi, sirīso tu ca bhaṇḍilo.
anya-e0809n3:1216: Tāpiñcho ca tamālo tha, kuṭajo girimallikā.
anya-e0809n3:1218: Indayavo phale tassā, ggimantho kaṇikā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1219: Niguṇṭhi’tthī sinduvāro, tiṇasuññaṁ tiṇasūlaṁ (ṭī.) tu mallikā.
anya-e0809n3:1228: Mātuluṅgo bījapūro, ummatto tu ca mātulo.
anya-e0809n3:1230: Karamando suseno ca, kundaṁ tu māghya muccate;
anya-e0809n3:1238: Japā tu jayasumanaṁ, karīro kakaco bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1243: Pūtilatā gaḷocī ca, mubbā madhurasā pyatha.
anya-e0809n3:1245: Kapikacchu duphasso tha, mañjiṭṭhā vikasā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1246: Ambaṭṭhā ca tathā pāṭhā, kaṭukā kaṭurohiṇī.
anya-e0809n3:1254: Nididdhikā tu byagghī ca, atha nīlī ca nīlinī;
anya-e0809n3:1255: Jiñjuko jiñjukā (ka.) ceva guñjā tha, satamūlī satāvarī.
anya-e0809n3:1260: Nuhī ceva mahānāmo, muddikā tu madhurasā;
anya-e0809n3:1261: Athāpi madhukaṁ yaṭṭhi, madhukāmadhuyaṭṭhikā madhulaṭṭhikā (sī. ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:1263: Vātiṅgaṇo ca bhaṇḍākī, vāttākī brahatī pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1264: Nāgabalā ceva jhasā, lāṅgalī tu ca sāradī.
anya-e0809n3:1266: Rambhā ca kadalī moco, kappāsī badarā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1267: Nāgalatā tu tambūlī, aggijālā tu dhātakī.
anya-e0809n3:1269: Tivutā tipuṭā cātha, sāmā kāḷā ca kathyate;
anya-e0809n3:1270: Atho siṅgī ca usabho, reṇukā kapiḷā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1273: Seleyya’ masmapupphañca, elā tu bahulā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1275: Kuṭṭhañca byādhi kathito, vāneyyaṁ tu kuṭannaṭaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1278: Mūlaṁ pattaṁ kaḷīra’ggaṁ, kandaṁ miñjā phalaṁ tathā;
anya-e0809n3:1279: Taco pupphañca chattanti, sākaṁ dasavidhaṁ mataṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1283: Jīvanti jīvanī cātha, madhurako ca jīvako.
anya-e0809n3:1285: Mahākando ca lasuṇaṁ, palaṇḍu tu sukandako;
anya-e0809n3:1286: Paṭolo tittako cātha, bhiṅgarājo ca makkavo.
anya-e0809n3:1289: Kāravello tu susavī, tumbyā’lābu ca lābu sā.
anya-e0809n3:1291: Eḷālukañca kakkārī, kumbhaṇḍo tu ca vallibho;
anya-e0809n3:1294: Mūlako nitthiyaṁ cuccu, tambako ca kalambako;
anya-e0809n3:1297: Saddalo ceva dubbā ca, golomī sā sitā bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1298: Gundā ca bhaddamuttañca, rasālo tu’cchu veḷu tu.
anya-e0809n3:1300: Tacasāro veṇu vaṁso, pabbaṁ tu phalu gaṇṭhiso;
anya-e0809n3:1301: Kīcakā te siyuṁ veṇū, ye nadantyā’niladdhutā.
anya-e0809n3:1303: Naḷo ca dhamano poṭa, galo tu kāsa mitthi na;
anya-e0809n3:1304: Tejano tu saro, mūlaṁ, tū’ sīraṁ bīraṇassa hi.
anya-e0809n3:1306: Kuso varahisaṁ dabbo, bhūtiṇakaṁ tu bhūtiṇaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1310: Tālo vibhedikā cātha, khajjurī sindi vuccati;
anya-e0809n3:1312: Hintāla, tāla, khajjūrī, nālikerā tatheva ca;
anya-e0809n3:1313: Tālī ca ketakī nārī, pūgo ca tiṇapādapāti.
anya-e0809n3:1321: Viñjho paṇḍava vaṅkādī, pubbaselo tu co’dayo;
anya-e0809n3:1325: Kālakūṭo tikūṭā’ssa, pattho tu sānu nitthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1327: Kūṭo vā sikharaṁ siṅgaṁ, papāto tu taṭo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1330: Darī’tthī kandaro dvīsu, leṇaṁ tu gabbharaṁ guhā;
anya-e0809n3:1331: Silāpokkharaṇī soṇḍī, kuñjaṁ nikuñja mitthi na.
anya-e0809n3:1333: Uddha madhiccakā sela, ssāsannā bhūmyu paccakā;
anya-e0809n3:1338: Migindo kesarī sīho, taraccho tu migādano;
anya-e0809n3:1339: Byaggho tu puṇḍarīko tha, saddūlo dīpinī’rito.
anya-e0809n3:1346: Khagga khaggavisāṇā tu, palāsādo ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n3:1349: Makkaṭo vānaro sākhā, migo kapi valīmukho;
anya-e0809n3:1353: Siṅgālo sigālo (sī.) jambuko kotthu, bheravo ca sivā pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1354: Biḷāro babbu mañjāro, koko tu ca vako bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1361: Hariṇo miga sāraṅgā, mago ajinayoni ca;
anya-e0809n3:1365: Eṇeyyo eṇīmigo ca, pampaṭako tu pampako;
anya-e0809n3:1366: Vātamigo tu calanī, mūsiko tvā’khu unduro.
anya-e0809n3:1369: Ruru raṅku ca nīko ca, sarabhādī migantarā.
anya-e0809n3:1372: Migā tu pasavo sīhā, dayo sabbacatuppadā.
anya-e0809n3:1374: Lūtā tu lūtikā uṇṇa, nābhi makkaṭako siyā;
anya-e0809n3:1377: Godhā kuṇḍo pyatho kaṇṇa, jalūkā satapadyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1378: Kalandako kāḷakā tha, nakulo maṅguso bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1380: Kakaṇṭako ca saraṭo, kīṭo tu puḷavo kimi;
anya-e0809n3:1385: Sakuṇo ca sakunto vi, pataṅgo sakuṇī dvijo.
anya-e0809n3:1387: Vakkaṅgo pattayāno ca, patanto nīḷajo bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1388: Tabbhedā vaṭṭakā jīva, ñjīvo cakora tittirā.
anya-e0809n3:1393: Patattaṁ pekhuṇaṁ pattaṁ, pakkho piñchaṁ chado garu;
anya-e0809n3:1394: Aṇḍaṁ tu pakkhibīje tha, nīḷo nitthī kulāvakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1397: Yugaṁ tu yugalaṁ dvandaṁ, yamakaṁ yamalaṁ yamaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1399: Samūho gaṇa saṅghātā, samudāyo ca sañcayo;
anya-e0809n3:1400: Sandoho nivaho ogho, visaro nikaro cayo.
anya-e0809n3:1402: Kāyo khandho samudayo, ghaṭā samiti saṁhati;
anya-e0809n3:1403: Rāsi puñjo samavāyo, pūgo jātaṁ kadambakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1405: Byūho vitāna gumbā ca, kalāpo jāla maṇḍalaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1409: Sajātikānaṁ tu kulaṁ, nikāyo tu sadhamminaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1416: Kalāpī ca sikhī kekī, cūḷā tu ca sikhā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1419: Candako mecako cātha, chappado ca madhubbato.
anya-e0809n3:1422: Pārāvato kapoto ca, kakuṭo ca pārevato.
anya-e0809n3:1424: Gijjho gaddhotha kulalo, seno byagghīnaso pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1427: Uhuṅkāro ulūko ca, kosiyo vāyasāri ca;
anya-e0809n3:1428: Kāko tva’riṭṭho dhaṅko ca, balipuṭṭho ca vāyaso.
anya-e0809n3:1435: Suvo tu kīro ca suko, tambacūḷo tu kukkuṭo.
anya-e0809n3:1437: Vanakukkuṭo ca nijjivho, atha koñcā ca kuntanī;
anya-e0809n3:1438: Cakkavāko tu cakkavho, sāraṅgotu ca cātako.
anya-e0809n3:1445: Lohapiṭṭho tathā kaṅko, khañjarīṭo tu khañjano;
anya-e0809n3:1446: Kalaviṅko tu cāṭako, dindibho tu kikī bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1455: Sūcimukho ca makaso, cīrī tu jhallikā jhillikā (ka.) tha ca;
anya-e0809n3:1456: Jatukā jinapattā tha, haṁso setacchado bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1465: Randhaṁ tu vivaraṁ chiddaṁ, kuharaṁ susiraṁ bilaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1467: Susi’tthī chiggalaṁ sobbhaṁ, sacchidde susiraṁ tisu;
anya-e0809n3:1468: Thiyaṁ tu kāsu āvāṭo, sapparājā tu vāsukī.
anya-e0809n3:1475: Silutto gharasappo tha, nīlasappo silābhu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1478: Sarīsapo phaṇī sappā, lagaddā bhogi pannagā.
anya-e0809n3:1480: Dvijivho urago vāḷo, dīgho ca dīghapiṭṭhiko;
anya-e0809n3:1481: Pādūdaro visadharo, bhogo tu phaṇino tanu.
anya-e0809n3:1483: Āsī’tthī sappadāṭhā tha, nimmoko kañcuko samā;
anya-e0809n3:1484: Visaṁ tva’nitthī garaḷaṁ, tabbhedā vā halāhalo.
anya-e0809n3:1488: Nirayo duggati’tthī ca, narako, so mahā’ṭṭhadhā;
anya-e0809n3:1492: Thiyaṁ vetaraṇī loha, kumbhī tattha jalāsayā;
anya-e0809n3:1501: Thevo tu bindu phusitaṁ, bhamo tu jalaniggamo.
anya-e0809n3:1503: Āpo payo jalaṁ vāri, pānīyaṁ salilaṁ dakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1504: Aṇṇo nīraṁ vanaṁ vālaṁ, toyaṁ ambu’dakañca kaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1506: Taraṅgo ca tathā bhaṅgo, ūmi vīci pumitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1507: Ullolo tu ca kallolo, mahāvīcīsu kathyate.
anya-e0809n3:1509: Jambālo kalalaṁ paṅko, cikkhallaṁ kaddamo pyatha;
anya-e0809n3:1510: Pulinaṁ vālukā vaṇṇu, marū’ru sikatā bhave.
anya-e0809n3:1513: Tīraṁ tu kūlaṁ rodhañca, patīrañca taṭaṁ tisu.
anya-e0809n3:1515: Pāraṁ paramhi tīramhi, oraṁ tva’pāra muccate;
anya-e0809n3:1516: Uḷumpo uḷupo (ka.) tu plavo kullo, taro ca paccarī’tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1518: Taraṇī tari nāvā ca, kūpako tu ca kumbhakaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1526: Poto pavahanaṁ vuttaṁ, doṇi tvi’tthī tathā’mbaṇaṁ ammaṇaṁ (sī.).
anya-e0809n3:1528: Gabhīra ninna gambhīrā, tho ttānaṁ tabbipakkhake;
anya-e0809n3:1532: Dhīvaro macchiko maccha, bandha kevaṭṭa jālikā.
anya-e0809n3:1535: Rohito magguro siṅgī, balajo muñja pāvusā.
anya-e0809n3:1537: Sattavaṅko savaṅko ca, naḷamīno ca gaṇḍako;
anya-e0809n3:1543: Pāsāṇamaccho pāṭhīno, vaṅko tu baḷiso bhave;
anya-e0809n3:1547: Kakkaṭako kuḷīro ca, jalūkā tu ca rattapā;
anya-e0809n3:1551: Atha sippī ca sutti’tthī, saṅkhe tu kambu’nitthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1554: Jalāsayo jalādhāro, gambhīro rahado tha ca;
anya-e0809n3:1557: Taḷāko ca saro’nitthī, vāpī ca sarasī’tthiyaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1560: Anotatto tathā kaṇṇa, muṇḍo ca rathakārako;
anya-e0809n3:1561: Chaddanto ca kuṇālo ca, vuttā mandākinī’tthiyaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1564: Āhāvo tu nipānañcā, khātaṁ tu devakhātakaṁ.
anya-e0809n3:1566: Savantī ninnagā sindhu, saritā āpagā nadī;
anya-e0809n3:1567: Bhāgīrathī tu gaṅgā tha, sambhedo sindhusaṅgamo.
anya-e0809n3:1569: Gaṅgā’ciravatī ceva, yamunā sarabhū (sarabū sarayū (ka.) ) mahī;
anya-e0809n3:1570: Imā mahānadī pañca, candabhāgā sarassatī sarasvatī (sī. ṭī.).
anya-e0809n3:1572: Nerañjarā ca kāverī, nammadādī ca ninnagā;
anya-e0809n3:1573: Vārimaggo paṇālī’tthī panāḷī (ṭī.), pume candanikā tu ca.
anya-e0809n3:1578: Anitthī padumaṁ paṅke, ruhaṁ nalina pokkharaṁ;
anya-e0809n3:1582: Kiñjakkho kesaro nitthī, daṇḍo tu nāla muccate.
anya-e0809n3:1584: Bhisaṁ muḷālo nitthī ca, bījakoso tu kaṇṇikā;
